name: SpeedFall
description:
--------------------------------------------------

How fast can you go without losing control?

SpeedFall is a fast-paced arcade game, dedicated to those who love high speeds! (and fans of Downwell as well, since it was a big inspiration for this project).

Loop around in an endless dungeon, clearing out ever-expanding waves of enemies while trying to keep your fall speed in check - that is, unless steering in the midst of total chaos sounds more like your style.

--------------------------------------------------

This game was fully developed by me, Miguel Pereira, but multiple free assets were used in the process which deserve their due credit.

Protagonist Sprites & Wall Tileset : Craftpix

Ghost Sprites : Pixerat

Bat Sprites : Elthen

Gem Sprites : Pixelfrog Assets

Audio Assets : Freesound
